name: nativescript-lottie
description: NativeScript plugin to expose AirBnB Lottie library

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo  && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemong: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-lottie && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-lottie && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
